entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Souris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
